<script>
/* Fade-in + zoom + staggered list */
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  const boxes = document.querySelectorAll(".section-mission-vision-value .core-box");

  const revealOnScroll = () => {
    const triggerBottom = window.innerHeight * 0.9;

    boxes.forEach(box => {
      const boxTop = box.getBoundingClientRect().top;
      if (boxTop < triggerBottom) {
        if (!box.classList.contains("visible")) {
          box.classList.add("visible");

          // Hiệu ứng staggered cho list item
          const items = box.querySelectorAll("li");
          items.forEach((item, index) => {
            item.style.animation = `fadeUp 0.6s ease forwards`;
            item.style.animationDelay = `${0.2 + index * 0.15}s`;
          });
        }
      }
    });
  };

  window.addEventListener("scroll", revealOnScroll);
  revealOnScroll();
});
</script>
